name: Serving Dice
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE    

Try to satisfy your customers with the tastiest dice there are.
But be aware, every customer wants it their own way!

This fast-paced skill/ calculating game is sure to make you sweat.

Can you beat all 3 levels?

Made for the GMTK GameJam 2022 
This year's topic was: Roll the Dice

Controls:

Left Click the dice to add them to your current total. If you have enough click on the right customer.

Use SPACE to flip the dice. Think about it. Every 1 is also a 6, every 2 a 5 and so on. Use it to your advantage!

Got too high in your total? Reset back to zero with R
